archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.2.4a: a) actions and behaviour expected of users to help address known threats (including rules on the use of blogging and social networking websites and being aware of social engineering attacks)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
